messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

internal scans results kale part re scans results kale hello there findings report about infrastructure covering multiple issues should be split several teams findings should be covered by application should be covered by line updates should be covered by findings about servers location were fixed fixed fixed fixed fixed available but access close incident but please review list open incidents for proper teams thank you senior engineer en sent monday october scans results kale hello please find above your queue thank you analyst ext hub sent friday october scans results kale hello please find above your queue thank you analyst ext hub sent friday october scans results kale hi can you please raise tickets relevant teams guess investigate hopefully fix vulnerabilities identified kale assets attached results vulnerability scans performed there recently kind regards information compliance officer extension or
